body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Sweet Delights Bakery customer service. My name is Eric King. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Eric. My name is Diana Washington. I have an issue with a return and I'm quite surprised by it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Diana. I'd be happy to help you with your return issue. Could you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the order number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. I have your order here. Could you also provide me with the email address you used for this order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Could you please describe the issue you're experiencing with the return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I returned a cake that I ordered because it was damaged, but I've not received any communication or confirmation that you received the return.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see. I'm very sorry for the inconvenience. Let me check the return status for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It appears that we received your return and it is being processed. You should receive a confirmation email within the next two business days.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Okay, thank you for letting me know. I was just worried since I hadn't heard anything.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Diana. Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks, Eric.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Diana. Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
